heading: HB05849
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF A NATIONAL ROAD FROM THE JUNCTION OF LANAO DEL NORTE INTERIOR CIRCUMFERENTIAL ROAD AT BARANGAY POBLACION, THROUGH BARANGAY LEMONCRET, MUNICIPALITY OF MAGSAYSAY, TO BARANGAY SAN MANUEL, MUNICIPALITY OF LALA, TO BARANGAYS PANSILAN AND KATIPUNAN, MUNICIPALITY OF SAPAD, TO BARANGAYS MAHAYAHAY, BEL-IS, MALINAS, SITTIO DAO, BUTADON, BANSARVIL, AND TIPOLO, MUNICIPALITY OF KAPATAGAN, TO BARANGAY CALUBE, MUNICIPALITY OF SULTAN NAGA DIMAPORO, TO BARANGAY LANTUNGAN, MUNICIPALITY OF AURORA, ALL LOCATED IN THE PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL NORTE INTO A NATIONAL ROAD TO BE KNOWN AS ILIGAN – AURORA BY-PASS ROAD, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
short-title: Providing For The Construction Of A National Road From The Junction Of Lanao Del Norte Interior Circumferential Road At Barangay Poblacion, Through Barangay Lemoncret, Municipality Of Magsaysay, To Barangay San Manuel, Municipality Of Lala, To Barangays Pansilan And Katipunan, Municipality Of Sapad, To Barangays Mahayahay, Bel-is, Malinas, Sittio Dao, Butadon, Bansarvil, And Tipolo, Municipality Of Kapatagan, To Barangay Calube, Municipality Of Sultan Naga Dimaporo, To Barangay Lantungan, Municipality Of Aurora, All Located In The Province Of Lanao Del Norte Into A National Road To Be Known As Iligan – Aurora By - Pass Road
principal-authors: DIMAPORO, MOHAMAD KHALID Q.; DIMAPORO, ABDULLAH D.; MADRONA. ELEANDRO JESUS F.; UNGAB, ISIDRO T.;
status: Approved by the House on 2020-01-27, transmitted to the Senate on 2020-01-28 and received by the Senate on 2020-01-28
